note.p: Death: Prestbury, near Cheltenham, Gloucestershire (23 October 1876)
Education: Nottingham Hospital; St George's Hospital, London. MD
Career: Started in medical practice in Chesham; practised in Gloucester (for 12 years); moved to Cheltenham (1851); led the national sanitary movement; Crown Member of the General Medical Council
Notes: List of 19 published works follow certificate - 3 sheets numbered consecutively
